caption: This photograph captures a pastoral scene set in a rural landscape. In the foreground, a group of cows grazes on a grassy field which spans the width of the image. The field is dotted with large, leafy oak trees providing shade, creating a serene, natural environment. In the background, the terrain transitions to hills, prominently displayed with one particularly large hill rising in the distance. This hill is mostly bare with a few scattered trees, and it has a golden-brown color, contrasting with the lush green of the foreground. The sky above is clear, suggesting a bright sunny day. Along the horizon, a white fence runs parallel to the foothills, subtly marking the boundaries of the pasture. The image embodies a quiet, rural charm, depicting a typical day on a ranch or in a countryside setting where agriculture or animal farming is prevalent.
title: Black Angus cattle at ranch
